createFormInstance

public java.lang.Object createFormInstance(HandlerDescriptor descriptor)
                                    throws FormException
Creates a new instance of a form object for the form class specified in the supplied descriptor by calling its default constructor.

Specified by:
createFormInstance in interface InstanceCreator
Parameters:
descriptor - the handler descriptor that describes which form to instantiate
Returns:
an instance of the described form class
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalAccessException
java.lang.InstantiationException
FormError - when a form instance failed to be instantiated
FormException - if construction fails

createHandlerInstance

public java.lang.Object createHandlerInstance(HandlerDescriptor descriptor)
                                       throws HandlerException
Creates a new instance of a handler object for the handler class specified in the supplied descriptor by calling its default constructor.

Specified by:
createHandlerInstance in interface InstanceCreator
Parameters:
descriptor - the handler descriptor that describes which form to instantiate.
Returns:
an instance of the described request handler
Throws:
FormError - when a handler instance failed to be instantiated
HandlerException - if construction fails

initialize

public void initialize()
Description copied from interface: InstanceCreator
Initializes this InstanceCreator if necessary. This method is called in the AgaveFilter.init(javax.servlet.FilterConfig) method, so it is an effective way to set up a mechanism for providing dependency injection or hooking into an IOC library.

Specified by:
initialize in interface InstanceCreator
